resources.string: Are your Articles on the internet too long to read? Who has the time to read those articles when life is so short. This app allows the user to submit a url of an article and condenses the article for the user. By using a text processing API called ______, the user is given a summary of the article and various keywords from the article. Save your time from reading articles and use this app to make your life ten times easier
This app is made for CapitalOne Coding Challenge 2016.
Use this app to summarize articles!!!
